message: I propose dividing the $10000 with a 75/25 split in favor of Alice, considering the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think I deserve a slightly larger share due to the increasing difficulty of negotiations as the rounds go on.

Considering the decreasing value of money and the trend of increasing offers, I propose a 60/40 split in favor of Alice. This maintains a fair balance while acknowledging the risk and effort involved in the negotiation process.
I'm willing to compromise further, but I think a 55/45 split is a fair reflection of the initial proposal I made in round 2, considering the decreased value of money.
